data.name: XDropTargetListener
desc: This interface is the callback interface used by the drop target object to provide notification of Drag and Drop operations that involve the subject drop target.
Methods of this interface may be implemented to provide \"drag under\" visual feedback to the user throughout the Drag and Drop operation.

methods.name: dragEnter
desc: Called when a drag operation has encountered the drop target.

methods.name: dragExit
desc: The drag operation has departed the drop target without dropping.

methods.name: dragOver
desc: Called when a drag operation is ongoing on the drop target.

methods.name: drop
desc: The drag operation has terminated with a drop on this drop target.

NOTE: The implementation has to wait until the method XDropTargetDropContext.dropComplete() is called before releasing the data for the drop operation. This should occur before returning from drop in a normal flow of operation. Also, the implementor of XDropTargetListener should not assume the DropTargetDropEvent to be meaningful after returning from the XDropTargetListener.drop() method.

methods.name: dropActionChanged
desc: Called when the user has modified the drop gesture.
